tweet: Tonight is 3rd night of no sleep since I went into a #LTC in #onhealth with 100s of #COVID + residents, almost no staff. So far,  my other LTCs have avoided outbreaks, but what I witnessed yesterday is needing words I don't have.  My brain  can't rest, and I think I'm in shock. 1
